params._newGrantee: The address of the new requested grantee.
The address of the new grantee. Must match the currently requested new grantee.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to stake.
params._extraData: Data for the stake delegation. This byte array must have the following values concatenated: beneficiary address (20 bytes) operator address (20 bytes) authorizer address (20 bytes)
params._stakingContract: The contract to stake the tokens on.

cancelReassignmentRequest().notice: Cancel a pending grantee reassignment request. Can only be called by the grantee.

cancelStake(address).notice: Cancel delegating tokens to the given operator.

changeReassignmentRequest(address).notice: Change a pending reassignment request to a different grantee. Can only be called by the grantee.

confirmGranteeReassignment(address).notice: Confirm a grantee reassignment request and set the new grantee as the grantee. Can only be called by the grant manager.

recoverStake(address).notice: Recover tokens previously staked and delegated to the operator.

requestGranteeReassignment(address).notice: Request a reassignment of the grantee address. Can only be called by the grantee.

undelegate(address).notice: Begin undelegating tokens from the given operator.

withdraw().notice: Withdraw all unlocked tokens from the grant.

userdoc.notice: A managed grant acts as the grantee towards the token grant contract, proxying instructions from the actual grantee. The address used by the actual grantee to issue instructions and withdraw tokens can be reassigned with the consent of the grant manager.
